list.name: Changes
list.comment:
feat(channels): add subject-based ChannelSelectionScreen; wire from Home; seed mock data
Why - Tutors need a clear entry point to browse classes by subject instead of a mixed feed.
What - New screen: ChannelSelectionScreen.tsx - Lists subjects → shows associated tutor classes - Simple CTA to enter a channel - HomeScreen.tsx - Routes/navigation updated to launch ChannelSelectionScreen - Minor UI copy/structure polish - data/mockData.ts - Seeded subjects and channel mappings for demo
UX - Clear split by subject before entering a channel - Reduces cognitive load vs. one big list
Notes - Static mock data for now; ready to swap for Firestore collections later. - No breaking changes.
